sentences.sContent: Her appetite for information was voracious.
sentences.sCn: 她对信息有强烈的渴求。

synos.tran: 贪婪的；贪吃的；狼吞虎咽的

remMethod.val: vor(吃) + aci + ous(多…的) → 吃得多的 → 狼吞虎咽的

words.tran: 狼吞虎咽地；贪得无厌地

trans.tranCn: 狼吞虎咽的， 贪婪的； 求知欲强的
trans.tranOther: having an extremely strong desire to do or have a lot of something
